text:
Hey there, that’s just kinda how email is. It’s not platform specific. Each Email client does different things to forwarded emails.

The reason has to do with normal simple emails. For example say you forward a message to a colleage. that just says

> hey there want to do a zoom meeting?
When you forward it, the email client adds formatting to make it clear which is the forwarded content and which is the content you wrote.
